Biographies of Dorothy Day

  • Memories of Dorothy Day

  • Eulogy at the Funeral of Dorothy Day by Geoffrey B. Gneuhs, O.P.

  • Servant of God Dorothy Day by Jim Forest

  • An Introduction to the Life and Spirituality of Dorothy Day by James Allaire and Rosemary Broughton

  • Driven By Love: A sermon by Fr. John Hugo following the death of Dorothy Day by Fr. John Hugo

  • Thirty interesting facts about Dorothy Day

The Eleventh Virgin, an autobiographical novel written in 1924, is available in the Library.

Also in the Library is From Union Square To Rome, an account of her conversion written in 1938.

The Long Loneliness, Dorothy Day's most famous autobiography was reprinted by Harper in 1997.
